elements.text: Welcome to MindTrails-Movement! This initial session will be a bit longer than future sessions. You'll be asked to complete some surveys about your mental health, thinking patterns, and daily functioning. Then, we'll ask you to repeat some of the surveys every 2 weeks for the next 6 weeks. Be sure to reach out to the research team at MindTrailsMovement@uvahealth.org if you have any questions or concerns. Ready to get started? Hit the Next button below to begin filling out questionnaires.
